thread.section_title: Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Truly a Paradise
thread.title_full: Truly a Paradise - Review of Munyonyo Commonwealth Resort, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: renemthetraveller
title: Truly a Paradise
text:
Stayed at this lovely place for 5 nights attending a conference, the place is really admirable and recommendable in every manner. The services are flawless, the place is huge and maintained to the best levels of cleanliness with beautifully landscaped gardens.
We also got a Sundowner Boat trip for a cocktail which was amazing.. Everyone attending the conference in our group liked the place and services.
Staffs are second to none... The place is Truly a Paradise...
